page.title: 06PINHOE VILLAGE:ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Pinhoe is a busy village with lots of activities taking place. There is something for all age groups from the Playgroup for the two to five year olds to the Tea 'n' Talk Club for the Senior Citizens.
Most boys at Pinhoe Middle School enjoy playing football, practising stunts on their B.M.X. bicycles and skateboarding. The girls also enjoy sport especially swimming and reading, cooking and playing musical instruments are popular.
There is a Cub Pack and Scout Troop, two Brownie Packs and a Guide Company for those children who are interested.
Adults can take part in a variety of sports including football, cricket, badminton, netball and tennis.
